Name: Makin
Description:
The Division of Makin consists of:

  • part of the City of Port Adelaide Enfield,
  • part of the City of Salisbury, and
  • part of the City of Tea Tree Gully
ProductsAndIndustry: Aviation, brick making, commercial and retail industry, higher education, hobby farmers, horse studs, light manufacturing, Modbury Hospital, tourism and wineries.
NameDerivation: Named in honour of the Hon. Norman John Oswald Makin AO, 1889-1982. Makin was a Member of the House of Representatives (1919-46 and 1954-63) and Speaker of the House of Representatives (1850-1908).
DemographicRating: Outer Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and containing large areas of recent suburban expansion.
